Quick Facts

EXIT   X

DUTIES OF PCBUs

Page

Table of Contents

 

 

Click the buttons below for more information

 

 

 

Training

A PCBU must provide information, training and instruction to all workers. This training should be easy to understand. It must also be suitable and adequate, taking into account the:

 

•

nature of the work performed by the worker

•

nature of the risks associated with the work

•

control measures that have been implemented

 

Physical environment

The physical environment of the workplace must also be safe for workers and all others. A PCBU must ensure that:

 

•

the layout and condition of the workplace allows people to enter, exit and move around without risk to health and safety

•

there is adequate space for work to be performed without risk to health and safety

•

there is adequate lighting to allow safe movement, performance of work and evacuation if there is an emergency

•

there is adequate ventilation and suitable temperature to avoid harm to health and safety
